homeDescription: Learn about how we can make Illinois income taxes more fair
faqCta: Have questions about how this will work? Check out our FAQs for answers.
calculatorCta: Find out for yourself how the Fair Tax would affect you and your family with the [Fair Tax Calculator](/es/calculator/)
calculatorPageDescription: Complete los detalles a continuacirpadón para ver una estimación de cuánto pagaría con un impuesto justo. No almacenamos ninguna de esta información.
calculatorDisclaimer: Tax amounts are estimates based on [approved tax rates](/en/faqs/#rates) assuming taxpayers file for credits they are eligible for.
k12ExpensesHelp: Ex: tuition payments, books, lab fees
taxChangeUp: Your taxes will go up
taxChangeDown: Your taxes will go down
taxChangeSame: Your taxes will stay the same
